item.title: Free and low-cost creative activities to try in January
item.description: January is the perfect time to try something new and there are plenty of free and low-cost opportunities to get involved in with over the next few weeks.

item.title: Come celebrate the new Clifton Global Lounge with us
item.description: We’re excited to announce the official opening of the new Clifton Global Lounge. Come along on Thursday 22 January to network with new friends and enjoy some global-themed crafts.

item.title: Introducing NTU Discover: Flexible, skills-boosting learning you can do anytime
item.description: Looking for small, practical ways to boost your skills alongside your studies? Explore NTU's two new Discover modules focusing on Generative AI and entrepreneurship.

item.title: New Year, New Deals at NTU
item.description: We are kicking off the new year with some exclusive deals at NTU Sport, making it easier than ever to keep fit and save some money.

item.title: Your January Welcome unlocked
item.description: Your essential guide to the first weeks of Term for new and returning students.

item.title: A greener way to get to Uni
item.description: Hire a bike for just £1 a week? Yes please! See the ways you can travel sustainably this term while also maximising your money.

item.title: Some of our online services will be unavailable from Friday 9 January – Monday 12 January
item.description: Due to essential maintenance, there will be a scheduled break in some of our online services from 5pm on Friday 9 January until 8am on Monday 12 January.

item.title: Student Dashboard temporarily unavailable from 6–8 January
item.description: We’re making important upgrades to the NTU Student Dashboard ahead of Term Two to ensure it continues to support your learning and engagement.
